biotools.summary: E-pRSA is a method for predicting the Relative Solvent Accessibility of residues in a protein chain without requiring previous knowledge of the 3-dimensional structure. E-pRSA is based on embeddings derived from protein language models.

bioschemas.name: E-pRSA
bioschemas.summary: E-pRSA is a method for predicting the Relative Solvent Accessibility of residues in a protein chain without requiring previous knowledge of the 3-dimensional structure. E-pRSA is based on embeddings derived from protein language models.
